text:
If you run the attached FO file you will see that the text does not line up 
with the bullet points on the left. The structure of the FO files is quite 
starnge because a mixture of tables and list blocks are used to achieve what 
could probably be achieved with a straight list. Still the FO is valid and my 
customer asked why the bullet does not line up with the text. The list blocks 
and table are children of a block-container which has position="absolute" but 
does not have width/height properties specified. If the width/height 
properties are added then the bullet points then line up with the text! So our 
BC LM must expect width/height and if they are not specified it can cause 
strange layout effects on the child LMs.
